timeline.message:
Fix Launcher --debug

After f648b877eafbfff297c235cb2af8f19ef84164ad, the jvm.config is
copied, not bound, so handling of `--debug` needs to be changed.

timeline.author: wendigo

timeline.bodyText:
This format is too complicated. You mix concatenation and format. Also you use format to concatenate two string literals.
Let's inline and use only concatenation.
Also I know that some people would extract a bash script from that.
timeline.author: kokosing

replies.bodyText:
I use format to formulate how i inject JVM arg into config.properties file.
I use concatenation to produce the JVM arg (since the variable part is last, format is not applicable).
Since the bash is oneliner, extracting it to a file would be an overkill.
Let me keep this.
replies.author: findepi
